Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a hidden number finding game and player compete against computer. Game has 4 rounds and highest score achiving player will win. If both players can not find the hidden number, they will get points according to their last guess proximity.
    Version:
    28.03.2018
    Author:
    Tuna Rezaiazar

    • Method Detail

      • comparison

        public int comparison(Player p)
        Method to check if the player's guessed number is lower, higher, equal or out of range. Returns 1 if the guessed number is lower than hidden number. Returns 2 if the guessed number is higher than hidden number. Returns 3 if the guessed number is equal to hidden number. Returns 4 if the guessed number is out of the range.
